question.description: Describe the relationships of UML with their notations (b) in a Library Information System, Faculty or Student can request for a book. Considering the general functioning of issuing a book, draw a sequence diagram to realize the same. Convert the sequencediagram to a collaboration diagram
Define (i) Coupling (ii) Cohesion (iii) Scope of effect (iv) Scope of control
What is a structured system? Write a procedure with an example to convert DFD to Structure chart using transform-centred method
